message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of offering $85. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $87.50?
